review: An eminent Orthropedic Surgen with an excellent knowledge and indepth study about Ortho related  Problems, Treate Patients with Atmost care and his explanations related to the Pre Surgery makes the Patients to be fully aware and Patient gets adequte knowledge about the Surgery and the fear or Threat being cleared, We are Proud to be Patients of Dr. Panthala Rajakumaran and my Left knee Repacement Surgery being fixed  End of April 2023 or By First week of May. For us HE IS VERY GREAT DOCTOR. Wishing All the Very Best. Thanks.

Excellent care pre and post surgery. Very easily approachable over phone and after surgery if any doubt. 
Humble and patience to clarify our doubts.
May God bless him with good health to serve who ever in needy approaching him.
